channel.title: VST Sounds Tab on Fugalist
channel.description: Recent content in VST Sounds Tab on Fugalist

item.title: Base Sounds
item.description: Base Sounds # This is where you enter the sounds you want to use from your VST instrument. To add a new sound, click the + sign and fill in the blanks. Here’s one example row: Name # Give the sound a name that you’ll recognize later. It will show up on the Assignment tab. Start # Add the MIDI events to send to start the sound, separated by commas.

item.title: MIDI Event Syntax
item.description: Specifying MIDI Events # MIDI Key Switch # A MIDI key switch can be specified either as a note number (0-127) or as a chromatic note plus an octave. MIDI Note Number # To specify a MIDI note number, just prefix the number with KS: KS3 ks13 ks 7 The default velocity is 127. If you need to specify a different velocity, you can specify the velocity after an “=” sign.
